data.text: @rick_pittman @VOCMNEWS I got a haircut like 2 weeks ago and never got tossed in jail 🤷🏻‍♂️
@NL_Killick @jayem1978 @rick_pittman @UncleAl91 @VOCMNEWS You cannot do so without a vaccine passport.
@VOCMNEWS Finally able to return home and not feel like a criminal at the airport for doing so. 👍🏻

@jayem1978 @UncleAl91 @VOCMNEWS Go out to a coffee shop after work today and don't show your vaccine passport. Get back to me with what happens. You also need a vaccine passport at a hair salon or a funeral home so the same would apply.
@rick_pittman @UncleAl91 @VOCMNEWS It's still not illegal to get your haircut or go to a funeral, Rick.

@jayem1978 @UncleAl91 @VOCMNEWS "Law Enforcement Officers (RNC and RCMP) have the authority to issue tickets under the Public Health Protection and Promotion Act and would be responsible for investigating any specific complaints of violations of the Special Measures Order." https://t.co/HegOK4q1hR
